Outlaw.name: Akhrunos
Outlaw.power: Add an Assassin card from your Deck to your Hand.

Outlaw.name: Alma
Outlaw.power: Move this card to any empty position, except the opponent's zones.

Outlaw.name: Barrel
Outlaw.power: Steal 2 treasures if this card is on a Treasure Zone position.

Outlaw.name: Black Fox
Outlaw.power: Gain 1 treasure for each 'Flying' type card in a Treasure Zone position that returns to your hand this turn.

Outlaw.name: Blaze
Outlaw.power: Kill all enemy cards that don't move during the opponent's next turn.

Outlaw.name: Cannon
Outlaw.power: Play 1 card face-up on the Treasure Zone position in the same column as this card, if it's empty.

Outlaw.name: Cerebro
Outlaw.power: Take control of 1 enemy card. Use your AP to move it, trigger its power or attack.

Outlaw.name: Charlotte
Outlaw.power: Kill 1 card in any position.

Outlaw.name: Cinder
Outlaw.power: Kill this card and return all face-up cards to its owner hands.

Outlaw.name: Daisy and Violet
Outlaw.power: Gain 1 treasure every time a card is removed from the game (active as long as this card remains face-up).

Outlaw.name: Dalia
Outlaw.power: The opponent draws 2 cards now.

Outlaw.name: Dejavu
Outlaw.power: Repeat the last triggered power.

Outlaw.name: Didi and Dingle
Outlaw.power: If this card dies, you gain 2 treasures (active as long as this card remains face-up).

Outlaw.name: Dr. Klonn
Outlaw.power: Take a card from your Graveyard and play it on your Zone 1.

Outlaw.name: Eldritch
Outlaw.power: Play as many 'Flying' type cards as you want face-up in your Zone 1.

Outlaw.name: Erzsebet
Outlaw.power: Give one of your cards the Assassin Skill until the end of this turn.

Outlaw.name: Euryale
Outlaw.power: Summon 1 'Statue' for each enemy card that flips face-up during the opponent's next turn.

Outlaw.name: Filthy Beard
Outlaw.power: Summon 1 'Pirate'.

Outlaw.name: Flamel
Outlaw.power: Double your Total Treasure. You cannot trigger any other powers this turn.

Outlaw.name: Gretel
Outlaw.power: Summon 1 'Rat' or 1 'Bear'. Remove this card from the game and play the Henchman in its position.

Outlaw.name: Grimas
Outlaw.power: Trigger the power of a card in either player's Graveyard.

Outlaw.name: Grotheus
Outlaw.power: Summon 1 'Demon'.

Outlaw.name: Guilhotine
Outlaw.power: Summon 1 'Headless-Soldier'.

Outlaw.name: Hadini
Outlaw.power: Summon 1 'Frog'.

Outlaw.name: Hameline
Outlaw.power: Summon 1 'Crow' for each empty position in the Treasure Zone.

Outlaw.name: Hanged Man
Outlaw.power: For each card you return to your hand this turn, choose 1 enemy card to return to the opponent's hand.

Outlaw.name: Hunters
Outlaw.power: Kill 1 'Invulnerable' card in any position.

Outlaw.name: Itsy Bitsy Lady
Outlaw.power: Enemy 'Flying' type cards cannot do any actions during the opponent's next turn.

Outlaw.name: Jesmine
Outlaw.power: Destroy the position under this card if it's on the Treasure Zone (put a coin there). Until the end of the game, a card on a destroyed position cannot steal treasures.

Outlaw.name: Juju
Outlaw.power: The Total Treasure of both players cannot be changed during the next opponent's turn.

Outlaw.name: Kraemer
Outlaw.power: Halve your opponent's Total Treasure (round it down). You cannot trigger any other powers this turn.

Outlaw.name: Kthul'haazgar
Outlaw.power: Summon 1 'Madness'.

Outlaw.name: Kuroshi
Outlaw.power: Gain 2 treasures every time your Assassins kill a card (active as long as this card remains face-up).

Outlaw.name: Lazarus
Outlaw.power: Summon as many 'Zombie' cards as you want, up to the number of cards in your Graveyard.

Outlaw.name: Limbo
Outlaw.power: Return this card to your hand and play a card face-up in its position.

Outlaw.name: Machado
Outlaw.power: Kill all enemy cards in adjacent positions to this card.

Outlaw.name: Magnete
Outlaw.power: Target 1 enemy card and keep the treasures it steals. Ready this card if it loses its target. (active as long as this card remains face-up).

Outlaw.name: Makuna
Outlaw.power: Kill 2 Henchman in any position.

Outlaw.name: Marvaud
Outlaw.power: Summon 1 'Shark'.

Outlaw.name: Miara
Outlaw.power: The opponent will lose 1 AP in their next turn.

Outlaw.name: Mr. Ivanov
Outlaw.power: Double your Action Points (after triggering this power).

Outlaw.name: Ms. Hive
Outlaw.power: Kill all enemy cards that stole a treasure on the opponent's next turn.

Outlaw.name: Muerte
Outlaw.power: Enemy cards cannot kill your cards during the opponent's next turn.

Outlaw.name: Naptali
Outlaw.power: Face-down enemy cards cannot flip face-up during the opponent's next turn.

Outlaw.name: Nevoir
Outlaw.power: Flip all your cards face-down.

Outlaw.name: Oberon
Outlaw.power: Gain 'Invulnerable' type until the end of the opponent's next turn.

Outlaw.name: Pompeu
Outlaw.power: Summon 1 'Boulder'.

Outlaw.name: Ragdoll
Outlaw.power: Add a Maniac card from your Deck to your Hand and return this card to your Deck.

Outlaw.name: Replica
Outlaw.power: Turn this card into a copy of another face-up card.

Outlaw.name: Rhowl
Outlaw.power: Flip all enemy cards face-down.

Outlaw.name: Russula
Outlaw.power: Summon 1 'Illusion'.

Outlaw.name: Sandiego
Outlaw.power: Attack a card and gain 2 treasure if this card kills it.

Outlaw.name: Shimaru
Outlaw.power: Kill all enemy cards that flipped face-up this turn.

Outlaw.name: Sumida
Outlaw.power: Swap this card's position with a card in an adjacent position.

Outlaw.name: Tilted
Outlaw.power: Enemy cards cannot do any actions during the opponent's next turn (except 'Flying' type)

Outlaw.name: Tintin
Outlaw.power: Choose a card type for this card and keep it as long as this card remains face-up.

Outlaw.name: Tormenta
Outlaw.power: Flip all enemy cards face-up.

Outlaw.name: Toxique
Outlaw.power: Kill all enemy cards that flip face-up on the opponent's next turn.

Outlaw.name: Ventus
Outlaw.power: Move all enemy cards 1 position backwards if that position is empty.

Outlaw.name: White King
Outlaw.power: Enemy cards cannot move during the opponent's next turn.
